d_opening: ???: To be honest, I really don't think we should be here...~
Ger: I know. Isn't that obvious?~
Ger: Oh come on, don't be a scaredy cat.~
Ger: Look! The moon is that way. Just a little more and we'll be out from the other side.~
Ger: If you don't trust me, that's fine.~
d_prologue: ???: Who am I? I don't remember anything!~
d_name: ???: Oh right, I'm ???! How could I forget.~
???: I remember walking with Ger along the mountain and...~
???: Better look around to see what's here~
d_die_1: ???: This doesn't look safe.... I could die.~
???: Better go back to larger areas.~
d_firstMed: ???: What? A bandage in the middle of nowhere?~
???: Well, that's convenient. Let me use it.~
: You feel power slowly returning into your body~
???: That should slow down the bleeding.~
d_usedMed: ???: I've used this before. There's no more bandage to use.~
d_normalMed: ???: Oh, another bandage. This will keep me alive for a while.~
d_huge_cave: ???: What a huge cave... Does someone live here?~
d_chest: ???: Looks like a chest. Too bad I don't have the key to open it.~
d_note_1: ???: A diary? Let's see what it says.~

6 April 1839: It's been nearly 2 months since I'm stuck down here. You know? I don't think it's that bad after all. All those lessons I recieved from that survival class is finally paying off.~--font:DiaryFont
: Lately, I've got a new hobby. You never know what 2 months of boredom can bring you. I spent 3 hou-~--font:DiaryFont
???: Looks like the page got torn off...~
d_note_2: 9 April 1839: Haha, it's a success again. This marks the 3 time I've done this. Can't wait for tommorow for another one~--font:DiaryFont
d_note_3: 21 March 1839: After a lot of failed experiment, I finally did it!~--font:DiaryFont
